A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot misses the mark by a mile.  Rian Johnson totally ruined the movie\, and possibly more.  Humor was misplaced.  Killing off Luke that way was disrespectful to fans.  Why kill off Snoke after building up a potentially awesome villain?  Where did Leia get her God-like powers to survive being blasted into space?  Stupid\, stupid\, stupid.  Ugh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
